message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $15,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you, and this is a fair starting point for negotiations.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $10,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but the product is worth significantly more to me than that.  How about we meet in the middle at $13,500?

I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, Alice. While I understand the value you place on the product, I would like to propose $12,000 as a final offer. I hope this aligns better with your expectations and our previous discussions.
